original_title: မင်းပေးတဲ့နာရီ
overview: Tick Tick Again is a story of reincarnation with a twist. It spans across two lifetimes and follows character Moe Nyi Nyi's journey as he retraces events from the present and progresses to the past. He attempts to unearth the connection between him and the happy couple who continually appear in his dreams, and it leads him to a shocking discovery. As he comes to terms with the honest truth and accepts the new reality, Nyi Nyi is forced to make an important decisionthat wil change the course of his life forever.
tagline: A love story between two eras
title: Tick Tick Again
